claim_text: Under MGNREGA, every eligible beneficiary in Maharashtra has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: Media fact-checks reveal that toilets built under the program are not functional or lack water and maintenance, undermining ODF claims. Toilets are unusable due to lack of water connections or broken pits.

claim_text: Jal Jeevan Mission has successfully provided households in cluster of habitations of Punjab with electricity connections and 24x7 supply.
report_text: Media fact-checks reveal that toilets built under the program are not functional or lack water and maintenance, undermining ODF claims. Toilets are unusable due to lack of water connections or broken pits.

claim_text: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao reports that roads connecting habitations in taluka, Maharashtra are complete and motorable throughout the year.
report_text: Reports provide mixed findings: while some pockets in taluka, Maharashtra have benefited, other areas still face shortfalls and inconsistent delivery.

claim_text: Under Beti Bachao Beti Padhao, every eligible beneficiary in Punjab has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: The road is reported incomplete or damaged in many stretches, leaving several habitations with only seasonal access. Toilets are unusable due to lack of water connections or broken pits.

claim_text: Jal Jeevan Mission has successfully provided households in district of West Bengal with electricity connections and 24x7 supply.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in West Bengal have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Road construction stalled due to contractor disputes and monsoon damage.

claim_text: The health initiative Poshan Abhiyaan has set up the required number of primary health centres in Assam and increased service coverage.
report_text: Independent monitoring found electricity connections installed and many households reporting regular supply in several villages. Beneficiary interviews corroborated receipt of benefits and regular services.

scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: Under Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana), every eligible beneficiary in West Bengal has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: Media fact-checks reveal that toilets built under the program are not functional or lack water and maintenance, undermining ODF claims. Electric meters installed but supply often limited to a few hours.
